title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 12.2 - Complaint files
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 12.2 - Complaint files

State Regulations
(a) A complaint
file will be maintained at one of the commission's offices. It will contain all
information in the commission's possession relating to a complaint. (b) Customers, utilities or their
representatives may look at and copy complaint files concerning cases to which
they are a party. Staff will provide copies of the documents in accordance with
the fee schedules in the commission's Administrative Manual. One free copy of
the file will be made for those customers who state that they are unable to pay
for reproduction costs. (c) Complaint files shall be kept for at least one year after a case is
closed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
12.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
